sentences.en: a suicide note
sentences.cn: 自杀遗书

sentences.en: a ten-pound note
sentences.cn: 一张十英镑的纸币

sentences.en: a thank you note
sentences.cn: 感谢信

sentences.en: Before she ran away, she left a note explaining her actions.
sentences.cn: 逃跑前，她留下一张便条解释原委。

sentences.en: Can I borrow your lecture notes?
sentences.cn: 我能不能借用一下你的课堂笔记？

sentences.en: Dave made a note of her address and phone number.
sentences.cn: 戴夫记下了她的地址和电话号码。

sentences.en: employers should &B{take note of} the needs of disabled people.
sentences.cn: 雇主应重视伤残人的需求。

sentences.en: He carefully noted the time when they left the building.
sentences.cn: 他们离开大楼的时候，他特别留意了一下时间。

sentences.en: He had written the note from memory, word perfect, and spelled atrociously.
sentences.cn: 他凭着记忆作了记录，用词恰当但拼写错误百出。

sentences.en: he sounded a note of caution about the trend towards health foods.
sentences.cn: 他对热衷保健食品的风潮表示谨慎。

sentences.en: I was going to write Kathy a note, but I decided to call her instead.
sentences.cn: 我原来准备给凯茜写个便条，但又决定还是打电话给她。

sentences.en: It should be noted that parking without a permit attracts a charge of £5.
sentences.cn: 提请注意: 无停车许可者收费五英镑。

sentences.en: Make a note of credit card numbers and check expiry dates.
sentences.cn: 记下信用卡卡号，核对有效期限。

sentences.en: many of his comments are worthy of note.
sentences.cn: 他的很多看法都值得重视。

sentences.en: Myra Cunningham sent me a note thanking me for dinner.
sentences.cn: 迈拉·坎宁安给我寄了张便笺感谢我招待的晚餐。

sentences.en: Note the statue to Sallustio Bandini, a prominent Sienese.
sentences.cn: 请看这座萨卢斯蒂奥·班迪尼的雕像，他是一位杰出的锡耶纳人。

sentences.en: Roman historians of note include Livy, Tacitus, and Sallust.
sentences.cn: 著名的罗马历史学家包括李维、塔西佗和萨卢斯特。

sentences.en: she greeted him gushingly, and that struck a false note.
sentences.cn: 她故作热情地跟他打招呼，反而显得很虚伪。

sentences.en: She made a mental note to have his prescription refilled.
sentences.cn: 她记着要拿他的处方再配一回药。

sentences.en: She scribbled a note to tell Mum she'dgone out.
sentences.cn: 她匆匆写了个便条告诉妈妈她已外出。

sentences.en: Somehow he tells these stories without a note of horror.
sentences.cn: 不知为什么他讲这些故事时一点都不害怕。

sentences.en: Stevens wrote him a note asking him to come to his apartment.
sentences.cn: 史蒂文斯给他写了张便条，请他去自己的公寓。

sentences.en: The engine note changed as the aircraft landed, taxied and halted.
sentences.cn: 发动机的声音随着飞机着陆、滑行和停下一直在变化。

sentences.en: The judge noted that Miller had no previous criminal record.
sentences.cn: 法官指出米勒没有犯罪前科。

sentences.en: The notes are at the back of the book.
sentences.cn: 注解在书末。

sentences.en: The Slovene bank has printed a specimen bank note.
sentences.cn: 斯洛文尼亚银行已经印刷了纸币票样。

sentences.en: There was a note of caution for the Treasury in the figures.
sentences.cn: 统计数字向财政部亮出了警告。

sentences.en: There was a note. Well, not really a note.
sentences.cn: 那儿有张便条，噢，其实不算是便条。

sentences.en: This is just a quick note to let you know that I won’t be in the office tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我写这封短笺是想告诉你们我明天不在办公室。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, this happy story finishes on a more sombre note.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，这个快乐的故事结局却比较伤感。

sentences.en: Violet appended a note at the end of the letter.
sentences.cn: 维奥莱特在信的末尾附加了一条备注。

words.tran_cn: 值得注意的，显著的；著名的
著名的；显著的；附有乐谱的
注意；记下（note的过去式和过去分词）
笔记；[声]音符；[金融]票据；注解；纸币；便笺；照会；调子

phrases.tran_cn: 借项清单；借方通知；收款票

phrases.phrase: hit (或 strike) the right (或 wrong) note
phrases.tran_cn: 完全正确（或错误）地说（或做）某事
人格底调子；正式照会；个人记事本

trans.tran_en: information that a student writes down during a lesson, from a book etc
to notice or pay careful attention to something

trans.tran_cn: 注意，记录，对…加注释，指出
trans.tran_en: to notice or pay careful attention to something
